name: Palo Alto Networks
description:
A VM-Series, virtual next-generation firewall, deployment blueprint for Nutanix Calm allows for simple, repeatable, and automated deployment of VM-Series firewalls when and where needed, all with the click of a button. Preconfigured workflows for scale-up and scale-down in the Calm blueprint make maintenance of your environment simple.
#### License:
* VM-Series - one instance per cluster node with VM-300 (strongly recommended) capacity license running a supported version of PAN-OS.
* Panorama - licensed for the number of VM-Series deployed on Nutanix and the version of Panorama must be greater than or equal to the version of VM-Series deployed.
#### Hardware Requirement:
* 4 vCPUs, 9 GBs of Memory
#### Platform:
* AHV
#### Support Information:
* To contact support visit: https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/company/contact-support 
#### Accessibility:
* https://[IP_ADDRESS]
author: Nutanix
